thread.section_title: dietDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of dietDirect | www.dietdirect.com
thread.title: EmmaGrace

author: EmmaGrace
title: EmmaGrace
text:
I tend to shop with many specialty on line services/products. Diet Direct is by far one of the best. Easy ordering, never any "glitches" or errors. It is fast, efficient and done. Once i didnt click a button i should have. the order went through and i got a call from customer service the next day. Very friendly, very patient and they fixed my error and order was never delayed for a moment.
I am a repeat customer and recommend it to all.
